title: Elevate SimpleQueryParser to own page in Solr Ref Guide
description: For expediency, we just added the SimpleQueryParser to the "Other Parsers" page in the Solr Ref Guide, but we should try for 4.8 to make it its own page like dismax and edismax.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I don't remember why I wanted to do this - it doesn't have a ton of parameters and it's not a default. The whole Query Syntax & Parsing section of the Ref Guide needs an overhaul but this issue is too small to capture all that needs to be done there.
